ALTER TABLE `trans_stats` ADD `frauds` INT NULL AFTER `signups` ;
DROP VIEW `trans_view_stats`;
CREATE VIEW `trans_view_stats` AS
select 
	`a`.`trxtime` AS `trxtime`,
	`b`.`companyid` AS `companyid`,
	`c`.`officename` AS `officename`,
	`a`.`agentid` AS `agentid`,
	d.username,
	`a`.`siteid` AS `siteid`,
	e.sitename,
	`a`.`typeid` AS `typeid`,
	f.typename, f.price, f.earning,
	`a`.`raws` AS `raws`,
	`a`.`uniques` AS `uniques`,
	`a`.`chargebacks` AS `chargebacks`,
	`a`.`signups` AS `signups`,
	`a`.`frauds` AS `frauds`,
	`a`.`sales_number` AS `sales_number`,
	(`a`.`sales_number` * f.price) AS `payouts`,
	(`a`.`sales_number` * f.earning) AS `earnings`
from 
	`trans_stats` `a`, `trans_agents` `b`, `trans_companies` `c`,
	trans_accounts d, trans_sites e, trans_types f
where
	((`a`.`agentid` = `b`.`id`) and (`b`.`companyid` = `c`.`id`))
	and a.agentid = d.id and a.siteid = e.id and a.typeid = f.id;
ALTER TABLE `trans_tmp_stats` ADD `earning` DECIMAL( 8, 2 ) NULL AFTER `price` ;
ALTER TABLE `trans_tmp_stats` ADD `frauds` INT NULL AFTER `signups` ;
